text:
This is rather niche, but document assembly is a big thing in the legal space. Think "TurboTax for [legal issue]".
See the open source expert system Docassemble or some of the low/no-code platforms built on it,  Documate and Community Lawyer.
Some of the older tools are Word with mailmerge or HotDocs.
